reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: More Fire! -Strenghtening Barefeet Children's councils

description.narrative: Project's Zambian implementing agency Barefeet Theatre works with vulnerable street children and youth to empower them and give them self-confidence to improve their own lives. In practice their method is based on theatre, acrobatics and other performing a rts. Barefeet has established youth local councils to organise youth and give an established base for them to co-operate and support each other, improve their own lives and to influence local decision makers. The youth council activities are established i n Lusaka, and the method will be spread to Kaoma and Livingstone during this project phase. Youth organised in childrens councils perform as role models to others and give an example that life as a street kid is not the only possible option. The project al so raises awareness among general public about the situation and living conditions of children living on streets.
